Who: LORD ELDER, Elita
Location: Ark - Control Room

> " Lord Elder, sorry =
for not gettn' back ta ya so soon. We had a little glitch in our battle pla=
ns... Tucson Prime told us ta stay outside the fortress, and we did, and wh=
en he went inside with Kup ta try'n get Nightshift out, he got captured, ag=
ain. But this time I think he wanted ta get captured.. Some sorta new strat=
egy he's tryn' out. As for us... I - dunno but Quickstride's got that look =
in his eyes.. He's itchn' for a fight. Normally I would just stay out of it=
, but, ya know somethn', I'm itchn' for some payback too. Wheels is in ther=
e and he's givn' it his all! The least we can do is return the favor and do=
 our part out here. We'll keep the com link open sir, so that way ya know w=
e're still with ya....

"WHAT???" Elder said, surprise making the word loud=
er than he had
intended, "They're all captured?" He said as he stood up and=
 leaned
over on the control panel in front of him. "FRAG!" he said as he
cl=
osed his optics and rubbed his head in frustration.

It was about at that t=
ime that little Elita came in the room . . .

> eliat Woke up and walked to=
wards command room, she still had her teddy bear in her arms, then she came=
 in and saw Lord elder
>
> "Lord elder, where is my uncle?"said worried the=
 girl

Elder turned to look at Elita as he sat down, attempting to push the=

fear and panic out of his voice and expression.

"He . . . He is on a miss=
ion Elita." Elder said as he hoped that the
smile he plastered on his face =
would look convincing enough.

As he talked  Elder pushed the mute button s=
o that Elita couldn't hear
the plan that Rat Trap and Quickstride were atte=
mpting.

"I hope . . . I mean . . . I'm sure he will be home soon." Elder s=
aid
as he walked over to the young Autobot, "Did you need help getting
back=
 to sleep?"

(TAG)

Preston
